effect.short: Lowers the user's Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user rubs the scales on its entire body and
makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon.
The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
